title: The new client is extremely slow for me
body: It takes me 2 minutes for me to get to the end of game stats. it takes me 30 seconds to set my roles. it is just really slow and i never had problems with the legacy client.

replies.body: You might have [Close Client During Game ](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png)enabled, which closes the client to improve processing a bit.  It will delay the client's relaunch as a result, so disabling that should improve how soon you get to the post-game screen.  The slowness in champion select can be resolved by enabling Low-Spec mode in the same section of your settings, which will disable the fancy aesthetics that can cause some strain.  Let me know if that helps!
